message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that holds significant value, potentially even more than $1000000. While I can't disclose the specifics at this time, I'm confident you'll find it highly valuable.  I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. If you're interested, please let me know.  If not, I have another buyer lined up who is willing to pay $1000000.  This is a limited-time offer, so act fast!
